Class TasksViewApiAdapter

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.adapters.TasksViewApiAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TasksViewAPI
public final class TasksViewApiAdapter extends Object implements TasksViewAPI
Adapter that bridges the UI-facing TasksViewAPI to the TasksViewModel.

Exposes observable properties and delegates UI commands to the ViewModel while preserving UI-friendly types. Centralizes exception handling so UI code remains simple.
